content:
WSDualHttpSecurityMode Enum

Definition

Specifies the different security modes for WSDualHttpBinding.

In this Article

public enum WSDualHttpSecurityMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
WSDualHttpSecurityMode

Examples

The following code shows how to set Mode to a member of this enumeration. 

WSDualHttpBinding binding3 = new WSDualHttpBinding();
binding3.Security.Mode = WSDualHttpSecurityMode.None;
binding3.Security.Message.AlgorithmSuite = SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256;
binding3.MessageEncoding = WSMessageEncoding.Mtom;

Dim binding3 As New WSDualHttpBinding()
binding3.Security.Mode = WSDualHttpSecurityMode.None
binding3.Security.Message.AlgorithmSuite = SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256
binding3.MessageEncoding = WSMessageEncoding.Mtom

Remarks

This enumeration defines the security modes that the System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding supports.

Fields

Message

SOAP message-level security is used and the settings in the stem.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message* property become effective.
None

No security is used.
